message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR 

This paper deals with the analysis of language and emotions in false information, which is a common problem in social media and online news articles. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) sub-category, which deals with natural language processing and text analysis. Additionally, the proposed LSTM neural network model involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, which are covered by the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The analysis of emotions in false information also involves social media and user behavior, which are covered by the Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with the detection of false information, which is related to information retrieval and search engines, covered by the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
